useresource-empty-src: Error message to show when there's no src or the src is empty.
useresource-invalid-title: Error message to show when the src provided is not a valid title.
useresource-invalid-namespace:
Error message shown when the page is in the wrong namespace. Parameters:
* $1 - The page trying to be loaded.
* $2 - The name of the valid namespace.
useresource-no-content:
Error message to show when the provided page has no content (e.g. it doesn't exist). Parameters:
* $1 - The page being loaded.
useresource-invalid-content:
Error message to show when the page doesn't have the required d content model. Parameters:
* $1 - The page being loaded.
* $2 - The required content model.
* $3 - The current content model of the page.
useresource-error-category: Category for pages that have UseResource related errors.
